mapper.insert: insert into TBL_WALLET_BS_TX_RECORD (ID, DELETED, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_USER, DEL_REASON, FIRST_INSERT, LAST_MODIFIED, FROM_USER, FROM_ADDRESS, TO_USER, TO_ADDRESS, AMOUNT, `STATUS`, TRAN_TIME,HASH, CURRENCY_ID) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstInsert,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fromUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tranTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{hash,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{currencyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
